title: Instructional Design and Technology Education Course Utilizing 3D Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A process where learners apply instructional design principles through interaction in a 3D virtual environment and strengthen practical competencies via peer feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can complete an exhibition hall design task using instructional design models in a 3D virtual environment.
Learners can apply instructional design theories to practical tasks while interacting in real time with peers and instructors.
Learners can revise their design solutions and establish optimization strategies through formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
